basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Jack Deskin Professional Media

description: This scholarship was established by alumni and faculty of the Mass Communication Department, honoring Dr. Jack Deskin, who was instrumental in establishing the Broadcasting program at UCO. He was involved with UCO for more than three decades as a professor, Director of Academic Broadcasting, and Chair of the Communication Department. The scholarship awards a student studying Professional Media who displays excellence in the study of broadcasting. Eligibility Requirements Professional Media Major Junior or Senior in the fall that the scholarship is awarded Minimum 3.0 GPA Must be a full-time student Active in Mass Communication activities

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
